name: Woy
description:
Woy is an audiovisual experience where you explore the galley and experience visually interesting 

kinematic always changing visual sculptures. In this experience each room contains it’s own music

and you can experience the transition from one to another’s by moving between rooms.

Author : Rok Košuta
